text: Peristernia carotiana is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Fasciolariidae, the spindle snails, the tulip snails and their allies. ==Description== ==Distribution== This species is found in the Indian Ocean along Mauritius ==References== * Snyder M.A. & Callomon P. (2010) Tapparone-Canefri’s type material of fasciolariid Gastropoda (Mollusca) at the Genoa Natural History Museum. Proceedings of the Academy of Natural Sciences of Philadelphia 159: 31–38. page(s): 32 ==External links== * Category:Fasciolariidae Category:Gastropods described in 1880
title: Peristernia carotiana
